name: Saints Row IV - Reverse Cosplay Pack
name_original: Saints Row IV - Reverse Cosplay Pack
description: Become the Avatar of the Saints Row Community with the Reverse Cosplay Pack. Chosen from the best of our fans' entries to our Reverse Cosplay contest, two outfits were handpicked and turned into in-game outfits! Wear the Genki Space Pimp outfit to end Zin filibusters in style, or don the Freckle Bitch's outfit to deliver justice the Saints way.
